files:
- installer: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_16_build.rar
game:
  args: /r:0
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Running Setup, please wait...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: dxwnd
- write_config:

        cdvol0: 0
        codepage0: 0
        coord0: 3

        filterid0: 0

        flagg0: 1207959568
        flagh0: 20
        flagi0: 138444804
        flagj0: 4224
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 0
        flagm0: 0
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 0
        flagp0: 0
        flagq0: 0
        icon0: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initts0: 0
        initx0: 0
        inity0: 0
        lang0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\GOG Games\Atlantis - The Lost Tales\Atlantis.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 0

        maxy0: 0

- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
wine:
    Desktop: true
